<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="setup" id="setup" inline="false" deletable="false" movable="false" x="10" y="10"/><block type="loop" id="loop" deletable="false" x="10" y="250"><field name="dropdown_mode">mode_while</field><value name="seconds"><block type="math_number" id="G[-#K,zaHo{Vu-wj?X+,"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="logic_boolean" id="_7d0:.?{s;|#Kk=ppd*r"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><statement name="loop_processes"><block type="sparql_query" id="h!AMY?[6l9.U/^_s7%n@"><field name="query">PREFIX rdf: <http://w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
PREFIX ble: <http://vocab.rapidthings.eu/ns/ble.ttl#>
PREFIX a: <http://vocab.rapidthings.eu/ns/ble/adapter.ttl#>
            
SELECT ?mac ?rssi ?resultTime
FROM <http://dw-station-5.local/ble/history/>
WHERE 
 {
     ?history ble:entries ?obs .
     ?obs a ble:RssiObservation .
     ?obs sosa:madeBySensor ?mac .
     ?obs sosa:hasSimpleResult ?rssi .
     ?obs sosa:resultTime ?resultTime .
 }</field></block></statement></block></xml>
